definition.featurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="feature_container" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><value name="feature"><block type="feature_custom_structure"><field name="structure">palm_tree</field><field name="x">-3</field><field name="y">0</field><field name="z">-3</field><field name="random_rotation">FALSE</field><field name="random_mirror">FALSE</field><value name="ignored_blocks"><block type="block_holderset_list"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="1"></mutation><field name="block0">Blocks.AIR</field></block></value></block></value><next><block type="placement_count"><comment pinned="false" h="105" w="222">Placement modifiers are processed from top to bottom. We try to place 2 trees in each chunk, and more rarely 3</comment><value name="count"><block type="int_provider_constant"><field name="value">1</field></block></value><next><block type="placement_in_square"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="189">We then move each tree horizontally, so that they don't generate in the corner of the chunk</comment><next><block type="placement_surface_water_depth"><field name="depth">0</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">These trees can generate in water, if it's at most 2 blocks deep</comment><next><block type="placement_heightmap"><field name="heightmap">OCEAN_FLOOR</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">We then move each feature to the highest solid block (which might be underwater)</comment><next><block type="placement_biome_filter"><comment pinned="false" h="85" w="210">We check that the tree doesn't generate in the wrong biome</comment><next><block type="placement_block_survival_filter"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">Finally, we check if the position is actually valid. Trees should generate only on blocks that support their sapling.</comment><value name="block"><block type="blockstate_selector"><mutation inputs="0"/><field name="block">CUSTOM:PalmSapling</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
